channel.title: Can someone fix my Chicken Killer+Feather Collector update?

item.title: Can someone fix my Chicken Killer+Feather Collector update?
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:3, topic:24549”][scar]program Chicken;
{ For “maximum perfomance” kill chickens at falador’s chicken place.
Because they are brown there.
Isn’t that cool?
Brown.

Anyway…
Set colors, and such.

Credit goes to me,
Jei jei KK, or JJKK, whatever you like. Second script ever.}

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}

const
ChickColor=529507; // Color of the chickens. No white plz.
ChickColor2=000000; // Who cares? Color? White? No?
FeatherColor=000000; // Color of the feathers. No white plz.
Feather = true; // if feather TRUE then get feathers, false, not.
Waitty=3000; // Wait time between clicks.
ChickensToKill = 400; // Multiply amount by 12, Tsadam! Xp you get from kills!
Lol=0;// No, Don’t touch.
var
Chickenamount:integer;
lael:integer;

Procedure SetupMe;
begin
ClearDebug
setupsrl
end;

procedure ownage;
begin
repeat
if lol=1 then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor2,True);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=Chickenamount+1;
Lael:=lol-1;
if lol=0 then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor,true);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=ChickenAmount+1;
Lael:=lol+1;
if Findnewbox then
Gamblenewbox;
if Findnewbox then
LogOut;
case Feather of
True : begin
clickmscolor(FeatherColor,True);
wait(500+random(700));
end;
False:begin end;
end;
if(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)then
exit;
end;
end;
until(chickenamount=chickenstokill)
end;

procedure Report;
begin
Writeln(‘Jei jei KK"s Free Chicken Killer.’)
Writeln(‘Now Going on report.’)
Writeln(‘You have killed:’+inttostr(Chickenamount))
Writeln(‘Thank you for using & Choosing my Chicken Killer.’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupMe;
repeat
ownage;
Report;
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)
if (Chickenamount=ChickensToKill) then
Writeln(‘End of script. Assignment done.’)
end.

[/scar]FIXT![/quote]

"ur a so cool peep"
Yeah, really.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone fix my Chicken Killer+Feather Collector update?

item.title: Can someone fix my Chicken Killer+Feather Collector update?
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]program Chicken;
{ For “maximum perfomance” kill chickens at falador’s chicken place.
Because they are brown there.
Isn’t that cool?
Brown.
Anyway…
Set colors, and such.

Credit goes to me,
Jei jei KK, or JJKK, whatever you like. Second script ever.}

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}

const
ChickColor=529507; // Color of the chickens. No white plz.
ChickColor2=000000; // Who cares? Color? White? No?
FeatherColor=000000; // Color of the feathers. No white plz.
Feather = true; // if feather TRUE then get feathers, false, not.
Waitty=3000; // Wait time between clicks.
ChickensToKill = 400; // Multiply amount by 12, Tsadam! Xp you get from kills!
Lol=0;// No, Don’t touch.
var
Chickenamount:integer;
lael:integer;

Procedure SetupMe;
begin
ClearDebug
setupsrl
end;

procedure ownage;
begin
repeat
if lol=1 then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor2,True);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=Chickenamount+1;
Lael:=lol-1;
if lol=0 then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor,true);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=ChickenAmount+1;
Lael:=lol+1;
if Findnewbox then
Gamblenewbox;
if Findnewbox then
LogOut;
case Feather of
True : begin
clickmscolor(FeatherColor,True);
wait(500+random(700));
end;
False:begin end;
end;
if(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)then
exit;
end;
end;
until(chickenamount=chickenstokill)
end;

procedure Report;
begin
Writeln(‘Jei jei KK"s Free Chicken Killer.’)
Writeln(‘Now Going on report.’)
Writeln(‘You have killed:’+inttostr(Chickenamount))
Writeln(‘Thank you for using & Choosing my Chicken Killer.’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupMe;
repeat
ownage;
Report;
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)
if (Chickenamount=ChickensToKill) then
Writeln(‘End of script. Assignment done.’)
end.

[/scar]FIXT!

item.title: Can someone fix my Chicken Killer+Feather Collector update?
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

I’m tired on updating my stupid chicken killer script. I wonder, why i even started it… Oh well…
I don’t know fully SCAR and it’s things, so I made my own “lol” thingy there… You can see it after Ownage; Procedure. It’s stupid thing, i call it “FunTion”
It’s NOT ready yet! It’s really boring script.

Oh well… It messes up with line i have

[scar]procedure Report;[/scar]

Failed when compiling Line 83: [Error] (15322:1): Identifier expected in script

I don’t get what’s wrong… Script goes here!
[scar]program Chicken;
{ For “maximum perfomance” kill chickens at falador’s chicken place.
Because they are brown there.
Isn’t that cool?
Brown.
Anyway…
Set colors, and such.

Credit goes to me,
Jei jei KK, or JJKK, whatever you like. Second script ever.}

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}

const
ChickColor=529507; // Color of the chickens. No white plz.
ChickColor2=000000; // Who cares? Color? White? No?
FeatherColor=000000; // Color of the feathers. No white plz.
Feather = true; // if feather TRUE then get feathers, false, not.
Waitty=3000; // Wait time between clicks.
ChickensToKill = 400; // Multiply amount by 12, Tsadam! Xp you get from kills!
Lol=0;// No, Don’t touch.
var
Chickenamount:integer;
lael:integer;

Procedure SetupMe;
begin
ClearDebug
setupsrl
end;

procedure ownage;
begin

repeat

if lol=1
then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor2,True);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=Chickenamount+1;
Lael:=lol-1;

if lol=0
then
begin
ClickMsColor(ChickColor,true);
wait(Waitty+random(500));
ChickenAmount:=ChickenAmount+1;
Lael:=lol+1;

if
Findnewbox then
Gamblenewbox;
if
Findnewbox then
LogOut;
case Feather of
True : begin
clickmscolor(FeatherColor,True);
wait(500+random(700));
end;
False:end;

repeat
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill);
if(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)then
end;
end;

procedure Report;
begin
Writeln(‘Jei jei KK"s Free Chicken Killer.’)
Writeln(‘Now Going on report.’)
Writeln(‘You have killed:’+inttostr(Chickenamount))
Writeln(‘Thank you for using & Choosing my Chicken Killer.’)
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupMe;
repeat
ownage;
Report;
until(Chickenamount=ChickensToKill)
if (Chickenamount=ChickensToKill) then
Writeln(‘End of script. Assignment done.’)
end.
[/scar]
